title: The Daily Show with Trevor Noah
text: Experience The Daily Show Explore the latest interviews, correspondent coverage, best-of moments and more from The Daily Show. S30 E131 • November 17, 2025 Host Jon Stewart dives into the biggest headlines of the day, providing fearless coverage, expert analysis, and no-nonsense commentary. 2025 Emmy® Winner Jordan Klepper investigates the world of young Republicans on this must-see special. New Episodes Thurs Jon Stewart and special guests tackle complex issues. Attend a Live Taping Find out how you can see The Daily Show live and in-person as a member of the studio audience. Settle Down and Listen Up Plug in to episode highlights and extended interviews with this award-winning podcast.
